catalog_script_client.name: Reservation space

sys_update_version.name: catalog_script_client_038b8f3197e20110002ffef3a253afc3
sys_update_version.payload:
<?xml version="1.0" encoding="UTF-8"?><record_update sys_domain="global" table="catalog_script_client"><catalog_script_client action="INSERT_OR_UPDATE"><active>true</active><applies_catalog>true</applies_catalog><applies_extended>false</applies_extended><applies_req_item>false</applies_req_item><applies_sc_task>false</applies_sc_task><applies_target_record>false</applies_target_record><applies_to>item</applies_to><cat_item display_value="Reserve A Space">bcde9043971a4110002ffef3a253af2f</cat_item><cat_variable>IO:9d9ca4c3975a4110002ffef3a253afd0</cat_variable><condition/><description/><field/><global>true</global><isolate_script>true</isolate_script><messages/><name>Reservation space</name><order/><script><![CDATA[function onChange(control, oldValue, newValue, isLoading) {
   if (isLoading || newValue == '') {
      return;
   }
	var a1 = false;
	var field = "";
	
	if(g_form.getValue("duration_type") == "hourly"){
		field = "time";
	} else{
		field = "date";
	}
	
	if(a1 == false){
		var script6 = new GlideAjax("ReservationClientUtils");
		script6.addParam("sysparm_name", "dateIsNotWithinSpaceDays");

		if(g_form.getValue("duration_type") == "hourly"){
			
			if(g_form.getValue("u_start_time") != "" && g_form.getValue("u_end_time") != ""){
				script6.addParam("sysparm_sTime", g_form.getValue("u_start_time"));
				script6.addParam("sysparm_eTime", g_form.getValue("u_end_time"));
				script6.addParam("sysparm_space", newValue);
				script6.getXML(dateIsNotWithinSpaceDays);
			}
		} else{
			
			if(g_form.getValue("u_start_date") != "" && g_form.getValue("u_end_date") != "" ){
				script6.addParam("sysparm_sTime", g_form.getValue("u_start_date"));
				script6.addParam("sysparm_eTime", g_form.getValue("u_end_date"));
				script6.addParam("sysparm_space", newValue);
				script6.getXML(dateIsNotWithinSpaceDays);
			}
		}
	}
	
	//dateIsNotWithinSpaceDays
	function dateIsNotWithinSpaceDays(response){
		var scriptResponse = response.responseXML.documentElement.getAttribute("answer");
		var days = scriptResponse.split("|");
			g_form.showFieldMsg("space", "Available on: "+ days[1], "info");
				if(scriptResponse.includes("start")){
					g_form.showErrorBox("u_start_"+field, "Start date must be on Space's available "+
										"days", true);
				}
				if(scriptResponse.includes("end")){
					g_form.showErrorBox("u_end_"+field, "End date must be on Space's available "+
										"days", true);
				} 	
	}
	
	var space = g_form.getReference('space', getAccessibility);
}
function getAccessibility(space) { 
	if(space.accessibility == "private_room" || space.accessibility == "private_office"){
		if(g_user.hasRoleFromList("x_616811_coworking.patron", "x_616811_coworking.manager", 
									"x_616811_coworking.admin","admin") == false){
			g_form.addInfoMessage("Private spaces can only be reserved by registered users");
			g_form.clearValue("space");
		} else{
			g_form.addOption("duration_type","weekly", "Weekly");
			g_form.addOption("duration_type","monthly", "Monthly");
		}

	} else{
			g_form.clearOptions("duration_type");
			g_form.addOption("duration_type","hourly", "Hourly");
			g_form.addOption("duration_type","daily", "Daily");
	}
	
	if(space.seating_capacity > 1){
		g_form.setVisible("attendee_count", true);
		g_form.setMandatory("attendee_count", true);
		g_form.hideFieldMsg("attendee_count");
		g_form.showFieldMsg("attendee_count", "Max attendee: "+ space.seating_capacity,"info",true);
	} else{
		g_form.setMandatory("attendee_count", false);
		g_form.setVisible("attendee_count", false);
	}
	
	
	
}
]]></script><sys_class_name>catalog_script_client</sys_class_name><sys_created_by>admin</sys_created_by><sys_created_on>2022-03-31 03:49:03</sys_created_on><sys_domain>global</sys_domain><sys_domain_path>/</sys_domain_path><sys_id>038b8f3197e20110002ffef3a253afc3</sys_id><sys_mod_count>33</sys_mod_count><sys_name>Reservation space</sys_name><sys_overrides/><sys_package display_value="Coworking space Reservation System" source="x_616811_coworking">5c180b8b970a0110002ffef3a253afe3</sys_package><sys_policy/><sys_scope display_value="Coworking space Reservation System">5c180b8b970a0110002ffef3a253afe3</sys_scope><sys_update_name>catalog_script_client_038b8f3197e20110002ffef3a253afc3</sys_update_name><sys_updated_by>admin</sys_updated_by><sys_updated_on>2022-05-04 06:51:31</sys_updated_on><table/><type>onChange</type><ui_type>10</ui_type><variable_set/><view/></catalog_script_client></record_update>
